mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY (PARTY_TITLE, PARTY_CREATOR, PARTY_PRE_MBTI1, PARTY_PRE_MBTI2, PARTY_PRE_MBTI3, PARTY_PRE_MBTI4, CATEGORY_NAME, PARTY_INTRODUCE, PARTY_LOCATION, PARTY_TUMB_PATH, PARTY_MAXIMUM) VALUES (#{PARTY_TITLE},'로그인미구현',#{PARTY_PRE_MBTI1}, #{PARTY_PRE_MBTI2},#{PARTY_PRE_MBTI3},#{PARTY_PRE_MBTI4} ,#{CATEGORY_NAME},#{PARTY_INTRODUCE},#{PARTY_LOCATION}, #{PARTY_TUMB_PATH},${PARTY_MAXIMUM})
